document_data.name: Korbus Brightjewel
document_data.source: [[The North: Guide to the Savage Frontier|N:GSF]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Korbus Brightjewel''' was the owner and proprieter of [[Korbus's Jewelry and Fine Ornaments]] in [[Daggerford]].
document_data.Activities:
An expert jeweler, Korbus could easily have found work at the higher-class venue of [[Waterdeep]] but prefered the life that could only be found in a small town. He was also an expert at identifying all [[:Category:Gems|gems]], magical or otherwise.

His home was located along [[Tymora Alley]] in north central Daggerford behind the [[Harvest House]].{{Cite interactive atlas|3990 Daggerford}}
